meanings.definition: A spherical bacterium occurring in grape-like clusters.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the staphylococci looked like tiny grapes.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the staphylococci in the patient's blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococci threw a party in the petri dish, forming a grape cluster dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The staphylococci multiplied rapidly, spreading through the body like a cluster of grapes.
meanings.sent5: The staphylococci's grape-like clusters made them easy to spot under the lens.

meanings.definition: Any of various spherical bacteria of the genus Staphylococcus.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician studied different types of staphylococci under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Staphylococci are commonly found on the skin and in the nasal passages.
meanings.sent3: The staphylococci in the lab formed a band, calling themselves 'The Spherical Bacteria'.
meanings.sent4: The staphylococci invaded the body like an army of tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how staphylococci can cause infections in various parts of the body.
